string-array.name: question_data
string-array.item: Count the people in the picture
Count the people in the picture

resources.string:
Your team will be doing some simple tasks that are needed for research purposes (labeling images, identifying object in images, ....). In exchange for your time, we will donate an amount of money to charity on your behalf. The team with the highest points will get some prizes.
First Prize: 4 Movie Tickets. Second Prize: 4 Meal Vouchers. Third Price: 4 Coffee Vouchers
